name: Sharedsqlite
tagline: A Sqlite class library implementation of the android 'SharedPreferences' object
body:
### Sharedsqlite.
Handling persistent data in android can sometimes be a headache especially when you only want to
Store a single row (that of course you wish to use time and again later on),
The system provides a [SharedPreferences](http://developer.android.com/reference/android/content/SharedPreferences.html)
Object however then you will have to create it as a private file, and read it in a private mode or use the default one? 

### Introducing - Sharedsqlite!
Sharedsqlite is a simple thread-safe database with a single table with a key-value schema where you can save your
(Mainly) primitive data types that suites nowhere else!
Writing and reading the data is only a one line code
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
